mapper.sql: select tq.id, tq.wjmc, tq.qyzt, tq.fm, tq.ms, tq.fb, tq.nr, tq.begin_time, tq.end_time, tq.kfcd, tq.sfnm, tq.del_flag, tq.create_by, tq.create_time, tq.update_by, tq.update_time, tq.remark, GROUP_CONCAT(distinct tt.name SEPARATOR ',') tags, tqs.wjnr, case when tq.begin_time > NOW() then '未开始' when tq.begin_time <= NOW() and tqs.wjnr is NULL and tq.end_time > NOW() then '进行中' when tqs.wjnr is not NULL then '已完成' when tq.end_time < NOW() and tqs.wjnr is NULL then '已结束' end as status from t_questionnaire tq left join t_questionnaire_student tqs on (tq.id = tqs.wjid and tqs.xyid = #{xyid}) left join t_questionnaire_tag tqt on tq.id = tqt.wjid left join t_tag tt on tqt.bqid = tt.id
mapper.select: select tq.id, tq.wjmc, tq.qyzt, tq.fm, tq.ms, tq.fb, tq.nr, tq.begin_time, tq.end_time, tq.kfcd, tq.sfnm, tq.del_flag, tq.create_by, tq.create_time, tq.update_by, tq.update_time, tq.remark, case when tq.begin_time > NOW() then '未开始' when tq.begin_time <= NOW() and tqs.wjnr is NULL and tq.end_time > NOW() then '进行中' when tqs.wjnr is not NULL then '已完成' when tq.end_time < NOW() and tqs.wjnr is NULL then '已结束' end as status, tqs.wjnr from t_questionnaire tq left join t_questionnaire_student tqs on (tq.id = tqs.wjid and tqs.xyid =#{xyid}) where tq.id = #{id}

mapper.select: SELECT q.id,q.wjmc,q.begin_time as kssj,q.end_time as jssj FROM t_questionnaire q left JOIN t_questionnaire_student st ON q.id = st.wjid and st.xyid=#{xyid} WHERE q.del_flag = '0' AND q.qyzt = '0' and q.fb = '99' and q.end_time > NOW() and (q.kfcd = '0' OR ( q.kfcd = 1 AND st.id IS NOT NULL )) and st.wjnr is null order by q.create_time desc limit 1
